o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_Check_FullShortcutDisabled
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Creator: BurggraaffC
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:OutputMessage: The following objects do not pass custom check:
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:CheckScript: Function %Check%(obj) ' Implement your check on <obj> here ' and return True if check passed ' or return False if not. If (obj.GetModelOptions().FullShortCut = True) Then WriteError "Please change the Model Options from Full Shortcut Model to Name/Code" %Check% = False Else %Check% = True End If End Function
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:AutoFixScrpt:
Function %Fix%(obj, outmsg) ' Implement your automatic correction on <obj> here ' filling <outmsg> as you wish ' and return True if successful.
outmsg = "Automatic correction not implemented"
%Fix% = False End Function
